CustomField.description:
Report to download Phone numbers in specific Campaigns to wash today - manually triggered. Manual wash ensures that the number of phone numbers to wash is small - quicker, and does not use up ACMA quota.
These will be phone numbers from Campaigns where the 'DNC Wash' was clicked today.
CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK("javascript:if(typeof(srcUp)=='function') {srcUp('/00O90000004y0eH'); } else {window.location.assign('/00O90000004y0eH') }", "Open Report and Export Phone Numbers")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Report to download Phone numbers in specific Campaigns to wash today - manually triggered.
CustomField.label: Manual Wash Export
